short_summary: Office furniture purchase for the DND in Bagotville, QC.
description: Purchase office furniture (office chairs, desks, etc) and deliver and install in Bagotville, QC.
duration_in_months: How many months the contract will run for if awarded
full_summary:
**Title (English)**
Bagotville B-62 Office Furniture

**Title (French)**
Bagotville B-62 Mobilier de Bureau

**Notice ID: Solicitation ID**
cb-500-64191143

**Modification ID**
Revision 8

This solicitation is associated with Solicitation ID: W6892-23-B066.

**Published Date**
January 19th, 2024

**Closing Date**
January 30th, 2024 (11:59 PM)

**Modification Date**
January 30th, 2024

**Expected Contract Start Date**
February 5th, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date**
July 1st, 2024

**Tender Status**
Expired

**Commodity**
Office furniture (UNSPSC Code 56101700)

**Classification**
Office furniture

**Procurement Method**
Competitive (Open bidding)

**Contracting Entity**
Department of National Defence

**Contracting Entity Contact:**
Frederic Lalonde
Email: uoiquebecqgasm@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (438) 336-7983

The Department of National Defence is seeking quotations for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture for the Bagotville B-62 facility. The contracting entity desires the furniture to be delivered to Bagotville, Quebec, within a two-week period prior to the desired start date of March 25th, 2024.

**Product Categories**
The department is seeking office furniture from the following UNSPSC categories:

- Product Category 1B – Supporting Components and Freestanding Systems
- Product Category 2 – Freestanding height adjustable desk/table products
- Product Category 3 – Metal filing and storage cabinets

This solicitation is made available under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Attachments**

A plan in high resolution (.pdf) has been made available for your reference.

**Reference Document**
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29786/w6892-23-b066_planhighres.pdf https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29786/w6892-23-b066-qa_qr.pdf https://
